Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After 30 days of CY injection ulcerous and non - ulcerous forms of chronic cystitis appeared in 86 % of DBA / 2 mice but only in 4 % of C57BL / 6 mice .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic cystitis |
| Ulcerous forms of chronic cystitis |
| Non-ulcerous forms of chronic cystitis |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic cystitis |
| Ulcerous forms of chronic cystitis |

The entity "non-ulcerous forms of chronic cystitis" is not a distinct disease entity, but rather a modification of the disease "chronic cystitis". Therefore, it should not be included as a separate entity.
